about_the_game:
Lead your royal house and ascend the throne as a Sultan or a King!

Rule one of the medieval nations of Europe, North Africa and the Middle East

Defend your lands from enemies both near and far

Build each of your towns and cities into a mighty stronghold and center of economic prosperity

Expand your domain by invading the territroy of rival nations

Call your vassals to war and order them to send armies

Demand tribute to fill your coffers and fund your ambitions

The kingdom is yours, what will you do with it?
